description:
doc: add "Godoc: documenting Go code" article

Originally published on The Go Programming Language Blog, March 31, 2011.

http://blog.golang.org/2011/03/godoc-documenting-go-code.html

messages.text:
Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com,

I'd like you to review this change to
https://code.google.com/p/go

http://codereview.appspot.com/5830043/diff/4001/doc/articles/godoc_documenting_go_code.html File doc/articles/godoc_documenting_go_code.html (right): http://codereview.appspot.com/5830043/diff/4001/doc/articles/godoc_documenting_go_code.html#newcode26 doc/articles/godoc_documenting_go_code.html:26: from a function’s documentation to its s/’/'/g http://codereview.appspot.com/5830043/diff/4001/doc/articles/godoc_documenting_go_code.html#newcode86 doc/articles/godoc_documenting_go_code.html:86: known issue from the bytes package: /pkg/bytes/#bugs http://codereview.appspot.com/5830043/diff/4001/doc/articles/godoc_documenting_go_code.html#newcode96 doc/articles/godoc_documenting_go_code.html:96: package “documentation”. The comment on the “package documentation” clause is s/“/"/g http://codereview.appspot.com/5830043/diff/4001/doc/articles/godoc_documenting_go_code.html#newcode134 doc/articles/godoc_documenting_go_code.html:134: and $GOPATH/src/pkg/ will already be accessible via godoc’s ...and any GOPATH work spaces will...

ptal https://codereview.appspot.com/5830043/diff/4001/doc/articles/godoc_documenting_go_code.html File doc/articles/godoc_documenting_go_code.html (right): https://codereview.appspot.com/5830043/diff/4001/doc/articles/godoc_documenting_go_code.html#newcode26 doc/articles/godoc_documenting_go_code.html:26: from a function’s documentation to its On 2012/03/15 01:55:05, adg wrote: > s/’/'/g Done. https://codereview.appspot.com/5830043/diff/4001/doc/articles/godoc_documenting_go_code.html#newcode86 doc/articles/godoc_documenting_go_code.html:86: known issue from the bytes package: On 2012/03/15 01:55:05, adg wrote: > /pkg/bytes/#bugs Done. https://codereview.appspot.com/5830043/diff/4001/doc/articles/godoc_documenting_go_code.html#newcode134 doc/articles/godoc_documenting_go_code.html:134: and $GOPATH/src/pkg/ will already be accessible via godoc’s On 2012/03/15 01:55:05, adg wrote: > ...and any GOPATH work spaces will... Done.

*** Submitted as http://code.google.com/p/go/source/detail?r=59b7d79b616f ***
